arcs.headline: New creative engines: LTX-2 and Imagen 3
arcs.summary: We've significantly expanded the generative toolkit by integrating the LTX-2 video model (supporting 1024x1024 clips with audio) and Google's Imagen 3 for high-fidelity image generation.

arcs.headline: Smarter text, stable streams
arcs.summary: Text generation gets a brain boost with an upgrade to Claude Opus 4.6, alongside a migration of Mistral models to OVHcloud infrastructure to ensure robust availability for all tiers.

arcs.headline: Zero queues, faster pixels
arcs.summary: We optimized the z-image pipeline and expanded our GPU fleet on Vast.ai, eliminating generation queues and speeding up delivery times.

one_liner: A massive drop of new models including LTX-2 and Imagen 3, plus a major upgrade to Claude Opus 4.6.
